message: So, running this website is taking my time, energy and my mind, and now I want to take a break to maintain this website because of my health. Also, I'm going to SELL this website, if you interested you can contact me on Telegram: https://t.me/mitsuaa for more information. || UPDATE: Infinite scrolling for Ongoing, Series, and Genre Page.
